example_sentence_english: I see a shop in the center.

example_sentence_italian: Ho aperto un negozio vicino a casa.
example_sentence_english: I opened a shop near home.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono molti negozi in città.
example_sentence_english: There are many shops in the city.

example_sentence_italian: Le insegne dei negozi sono nuove.
La vetrina del negozio è luminosa.

example_sentence_english: I will go to the shop tomorrow.

example_sentence_italian: Consegnerò i volantini ai negozi del quartiere.
example_sentence_english: I'll deliver the flyers to the shops in the neighborhood.
I pick up the package from the shop.

example_sentence_italian: Ho ricevuto feedback dai negozi della zona.
example_sentence_english: I received feedback from the shops in the area.
There are lights in the shop.

example_sentence_italian: Troverai offerte nei negozi del centro.
example_sentence_english: You'll find deals in the shops downtown.
There is a sign on the shop.

example_sentence_italian: Ho scritto articoli sui negozi locali.
example_sentence_english: I wrote articles about local shops.

example_sentence_italian: Ho un accordo col negozio vicino.
example_sentence_english: I have an agreement with the nearby shop.
